7e9ea458-0bc2-4fc1-8e6a-0383e638f6ef.description: At Microsoft, we’ve recognized six principles that we believe should guide AI development and use — fairness, reliability and safety, privacy and security, inclusiveness, transparency, and accountability. For us, these principles are the cornerstone of a responsible and trustworthy approach to AI, especially as intelligent technology becomes more prevalent in the products and services we use every day.
7e9ea458-0bc2-4fc1-8e6a-0383e638f6ef.name: Microsoft Artificial Intelligence Industry Leader Certification

issuer.summary: issued by Microsoft AI & Sustainability Program

badge_template_activities.title: Responsible AI Learning: Lean the keys to using artificial intelligence in your organization. How to use it responsibly, what frameworks can one use for your organization, and how to govern its use. As AI becomes more prevalent, it’s imperative that organizations have governing practices in place to ensure that it’s used responsibly. We recognize that every organization will have their own perspective on responsible AI, but we hope our perspective provides a starting point for your AI journey.

AI Technology Overview Learning: This training provides a high-level overview of the primary concepts of AI and the technologies behind it. In addition, it will cover the biggest reasons why the current environment has led to explosive opportunity for AI models and solutions. Lastly, it reviews how Microsoft is turning the latest advancements in AI into tools, products, and services that can be used to assist organizations in AI management.

AI Ready Culture Learning: A successful AI strategy must consider cultural issues as well as business issues. Becoming an AI-ready organization requires a fundamental transformation in how you do things, how employees relate to each other, what skills they have, and what processes and principles guide your behaviors. This training is designed to help you understand which are the key elements that make a culture AI-ready and proposes a framework to drive that change in your organization.

AI Digital Transformation, Operations, and Scale Learning: Learn the keys to how Microsoft has created an AI “center of excellence” and how your organization may manage AI throughout your organization. Our answer boils down to: everyone in an organization has a role to play in AI transformation. To be successful, an AI initiative needs support from leaders, line of business employees, and technical employees.

AI Strategy Learning: This module provides an overview of Azure AI and demonstrates how Microsoft tools, services, and infrastructure can help make AI real for your organization, whether you want to unlock insights from your latent data with knowledge mining, develop your own AI models with machine learning, or build immersive apps using AI.

3ee5416c-1552-4797-b6fc-08fabc9e8570.description: The badge earner has demonstrated the skills and ability to develop innovative data and AI technology solutions to help solve real and complex business challenges for improving customer experiences.
3ee5416c-1552-4797-b6fc-08fabc9e8570.name: T-Mobile NT Hackathon 2021 Participant

issuer.summary: issued by Microsoft AI & Sustainability Program
